column1: #text=Last year I had extra vacation days which if not used would not have carried over to this year .
#text=So in early Novermber , I started planning for a vacation and decided to go to New York .
#text=I purchased airline tickets for my family from a airline 's website .
#text=It was for 2 weeks starting from December 7th to 22nd .
#text=On 7th evening , we reached at the airport almost 3 hours before the flight 's departure .
#text=At the check in counter , I presented my driving license and ticket .
#text=The person at the counter verified my name and ticket and after security check , we got into the plane .
#text=I was at the window seat , so I could see the outside pretty well .
#text=Before take off , flight attendants asked us to put on seat belts .
#text=It took almost 2 hours for us to reach New York .
#text=Overall it was a nice flight and we reached there on time .
